name: Hack and Climb
description:
HACK AND CLIMB kicks new life into the traditional 2D-Platformer!
Juggle your ball to the goal with super tight controls - JUST DON'T DROP IT!

Imagine a ninja playing hacky sack(foot-bag) while parkouring...
That's HACK AND CLIMB.

Explore 30+ hand crafted stages while you kick past enemies and destroy massive bosses.

  • HACK! Use your arsenal of kicks and stunts to kick the ball into the goal.
  • CLIMB! Traverse and climb obstacles while juggling the ball in air.
  • DON'T LET IT DROP! If the ball touches the ground you instantly re-spawn at the last checkpoint!

Easy controls designed for different play styles.

  • PLAY YOUR WAY! Speed running? Slow plotting kicks? Crazy back flips and ninja slides? Hack and Climb has it all.
  • SO MANY KICKS! Hack and Climb has over 10 types of kicks. Use each of them to juggle your way across sprawling stages.


HACK AND CLIMB was developed wholly by Colby Crawford.
One guy, a big dream and a neglected girlfriend.

GAME-PAD RECOMMENDED FOR BEST EXPERIENCE! (Keyboard is supported)
